title: FactionInfamyAmbushChat
description: Controls the chat lines broadcast when the Faction Infamy system announces ambush activity.

defaultColor.description: Fallback colour applied to all formatted messages. Accepts #RRGGBB or #RRGGBBAA values.

defaultTierMessages.description: Base message templates keyed by ambush tier (1-5).

^[1-5]$.description: Message template for the corresponding tier.

metadata.description: Optional helper text displayed to server administrators editing the file.

factions.description: Per-faction overrides for colour and tier messages.

color.description: Hex colour applied to this faction's announcements.

tierMessages.description: Message overrides keyed by ambush tier.
